headline: Alger Russell Innovation Index Updates for Third Quarter 2025
summary: Fred Alger Management, LLC ("Alger"), a privately held growth equity investment manager, today announced the quarterly rebalancing of the Alger Russell Innovation Index ("Index"). Following the close of trading on Friday, September 19, 2025, the Index will be rebalanced, and the following changes will be effective.

headline: 1 Reason Wall Street Is Obsessed With Vertex Pharmaceuticals
summary: Here's why you can't find a Wall Street analyst who will tell you to sell this stock.
